Junfu Han / USA TODAY NETWORK

Matthew Mitchell

8 Maxim Štrbák

Class Sophomore

Ht./Wt. 6-2 / 205

Hometown Košice, Slovakia

Prev School Sioux Falls (USHL)

Pronunciation MAX-im STIR-back

NHL Draft BUF 2023 (2/45)

Bio

Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

2023-24 (FRESHMAN):

Skated in 32 games on the Spartan blueline ... Compiled a 2-7-9 scoring line (+7) with 27 blocked shots ... Made his collegiate debut in the opener against Lake State (10/7) ... Recorded his first career goal against Canisius, and had a goal and an assist with four blocked shots in the series (10/19-20) ... Had an assist in the opening game at Ohio State (11/3) ... Picked up an assist in both of the wins over No. 1 Wisconsin (11/17-18) ... Assisted on the first and game-winning goals in a dramatic come-from-behind win over Minnesota (1/26) ... Had a goal and an assist (+2) in MSU’s second win of the season at Michigan (2/9).

PRIOR TO MSU:

Drafted in the second round (45th pick overall) by the Buffalo Sabres in the 2023 NHL Entry Draft ... Played his final junior season for the Sioux Falls Stampede (2022-23), where he had 18 points (5g, 13a) and 51 PIMs … Played juniors for Jokerit (Finland) from 2019-2022, where he was +17 with 26 PIM in his final year (2021-22), posting a goal and seven assists in 39 games.

WITH TEAM SLOVAKIA:

Was selected as one of Slovakia's top three performers of the tournament in the 2024 IIHF World Junior Championships ...Three-time World Junior Championship participant for Team Slovakia in 2021-22 (Edmonton) , 2022-23 (Nova Scotia) and 2023-24 (Sweden) ... Played for Team Slovakia at the 2023 Men’s U18 World Championships in Switzerland, finishing fourth and serving as an alternate captain … Played in the Ivan Hlinka Tournament on Slovakia’s 2022 squad …

PERSONAL:

Son of Martin and Lubica Strbak … Has one brother, Martin, who studies at Erasmus University in Rotterdam … Father, Martin, played for Slovakia in the Vancouver Olympics in 2010 and won titles in Slovakia, Czechia, and Russia in addition to a gold, silver, and bronze medal in World Championships … Father also played in the NHL for the LA Kings and Pittsburgh … Enjoys reading, playing chess, and video games ... Advertising management major.
